text_blocks.content: The toilet may not be correctly working in cell #4 in the Psych Observation area. When he returns from Attorney Conference, please move him into a different cell.

additional_notes: The document is a redacted email regarding Inmate Epstein #76318-054. The email discusses a maintenance issue with the toilet in cell #4 in the Psych Observation area and requests that the inmate be moved to a different cell upon his return from Attorney Conference. Several names and email addresses have been redacted.
